meanings.sent1: The movie was uncomic, and I didn't laugh at all.
meanings.sent2: His jokes were always uncomic, and no one found them amusing.
meanings.sent3: The uncomic situation made everyone groan instead of laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her attempt at humor fell flat, leaving an uncomic silence in the room.
meanings.sent5: The uncomic performance left the audience bored and unimpressed.

meanings.sent1: The comedian's uncomic routine failed to make anyone laugh.
meanings.sent2: The book was uncomic, with no clever jokes or witty remarks.
meanings.sent3: His uncomic remarks made everyone roll their eyes instead of chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The uncomic banter between the characters felt forced and awkward.
meanings.sent5: The uncomic dialogue fell flat, lacking any spark of humor or wit.
